context.p: This task describes how to drain antifreeze coolant from a radiator. Make sure the engine has completely cooled before beginning this task.

step.cmd: Open the car's hood and find the antifreeze reservoir. Turn the radiator fill cap until it hisses, wait until the hissing stops, and remove the cap.
Place a drain pan or other large container under the drain valve.
Loosen the radiator's valve to begin to drain the coolant . Allow the coolant to drain completely.
Properly dispose of the old coolant at a local hazardous waste site.
